dct_title_s: A cidade de Angra na ilha de Iesu xpō da Tercera que esta em 39. graos
dct_description_sm: auctor. Ioannes Hugonius a. Linschoten aō. 1595 ; Baptista à Doetechum, sculp.
Oriented with north toward lower right of sheet.
Decorative cartouches, coats of arms, elaborate compass rose, ships, flags, cherubs.
From Linschoten's Itenerario, voyagie, ofte Ship-vaert, Amsterdam: Claesz, 1596.
